thread.section_title: Alhambra Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent for the price
thread.title_full: Excellent for the price - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Steve G
title: Excellent for the price
text: I'm staying in the Alhambra this evening (March 1st). I'm only here one night and wanted to be near St Pancras, which is a three minute walk away. Very convenient. My room is expectedly small but exceptionally clean. The small toilet/shower area is like new, the carpet looks new and my bed is comfortable. The tiny sink is slightly in the way of the toilet, I am six feet tall and 215 pounds so the sink issue isn't a huge problem, just a very slight inconvenience. The hotel staff were very accommodating and moved my stored luggage to my room while I was sight seeing. I recommend the Alhambra if you need to be in the St Pancras / Kings Cross area of London.
